pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, August 16, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Saint-Eustache, Quebec

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will highlight the Canada Child Benefit. A media availability will follow.

Bibliothèque Guy-Bélisle
12, chemin de la Grande-Côte

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m. and report to room 106,1 Salle Polyvalente.

Blainville, Quebec

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local food bank.

Moisson Laurentides
25, rue Rolland-Brière

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media should arrive no later than 12:30 p.m. 

Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the International Balloon Festival.

Aéroport de Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu
Chemin de l'Aéroport

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media should arrive no later than 4:30 p.m. at the VIP Entrance and report to Geneviève Côté.
